```{python}
#!/usr/bin/env python
# coding: utf-8


import snscrape.modules.twitter as sntwitter
import pandas as pd
from IPython.display import display, HTML
import markdown

tweets_list = []   #セカイの4コマ

# Using TwitterSearchScraper to scrape data and append tweets to list
for i,tweet in enumerate(sntwitter.TwitterSearchScraper('from:@pj_sekai #セカイの4コマ').get_items()):
    tweets_list.append(tweet.url)

for i in range(len(tweets_list)):
    display(HTML('<h6 id="Header'+str(i+1)+'">第'+str(i+1)+'話</h6><br><blockquote class="twitter-tweet" style="height:50px"><a href="'+tweets_list[len(tweets_list)-i-1]+'"></a></blockquote> <script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script>'))

```
